business.name: Bleu Orleans
business.description: Curated vintage jewelry and unique accessories that tell stories of timeless elegance and exceptional craftsmanship.

owner.name: Myra Ponder Mccrary
owner.title: Creative Force & Owner
owner.bio: Myra Ponder Mccrary is the creative force behind Bleu Orleans. She has been selling her jewelry since 2021. She loves making jewelry and pours her heart into every piece she creates. Myra is also a devoted mother who cherishes her children deeply. In addition to her passion for jewelry, she serves as a realtor for Legend Realty Group in Huntsville, helping families find their perfect homes. Myra is a big fan of antiquing and thrifting, always on the hunt for unique treasures and inspiration.
owner.quote: Jewelry is a story you wear.

policies.care_instructions: Gentle cleaning with soft cloth recommended
